Nutscue

 My first group project at FutureGames.

During this production period I was programming lead and worked primarily on architectural and foundational systems.

Here's a snippet of the damage system.

The video on the left displays normal gameplay, while the one on the right shows the hurtbox.

The game uses a checkpoint system. The players location is stored at a checkmark which is only flagged once, so that checkpoint cannot be used again.

The above clips showcase what happens restarting at the start position, and the left video shows that the later checkpoint is now stored.

More info at the itch page!
